interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Trolls DHD
Review Date: 2018/09/30
Store: Kendrick, Anna  (Actor),     Timberlake, Justin  (Actor)    Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Movies
Product Description: ["From the creators of Shrek comes the most smart, funny, irreverent animated comedy of the year, DreamWorks' Trolls. This holiday season, enter a colorful, wondrous world populated by hilariously unforgettable characters and discover the story of the overly optimistic Trolls, with a constant song on their lips, and the comically pessimistic Bergens, who are only happy when they have trolls in their stomach. Featuring original music from Justin Timberlake, and soon-to-be classic mash-ups of songs from other popular artists, the film stars the voice talents of Anna Kendrick, Justin Timberlake, Russell Brand, James Corden, Kunal Nayyar, Ron Funches, Icona Pop, Gwen Stefani, and many more. DreamWorks' TROLLS is a fresh, broad comedy filled with music, heart and hair-raising adventures. In November of 2016, nothing can prepare you for our new Troll world."]
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '43448706', 'Media Format': 'Dolby, AC-3, Subtitled, Dubbed, Widescreen, NTSC', 'Run time': '92 minutes', 'Release date': 'February 7, 2017', 'Actors': 'Kendrick, Anna, Timberlake, Justin, Brand, Russell, Corden, James, Nayyar, Kunal', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, English, French', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: Such a happy movie we all love watching it
Review Title: Fun and happy moods after
Rating: 5.0

The Fate of the Furious
Vin Diesel  (Actor, Producer),     Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson  (Actor),     F. Gary Gray  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Action & Adventure
["Now that Dominic Toretto (Vin Diesel) and Letty Ortiz (Michelle Rodriguez) are on their honeymoon, and Brian (Paul Walker) and Mia (Jordana Brewster) have retired from the game, and the rest of the crew has been exonerated, the globetrotting team has found a semblance of a normal life. But when a mysterious woman seduces Dom into the world of crime he can't seem to escape, and a betrayal of those closest to him, they will face trials that will test them as never before. From the shores of Cuba and the streets of New York City to the icy plains off the arctic Barents Sea, the elite force will crisscross the globe to stop an anarchist from unleashing chaos on the world's stage, and to bring home the man who made them a family. —harpreet phamber"]

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** The user has a continued interest in classic movies from the 1980s and 1990s while expanding their viewing repertoire to include more contemporary genres such as animated films. They remain fond of nostalgia-driven content but are now embracing family-friendly animated features.
  
- **Genre Interest:** In addition to classic and music-related films, the user now enjoys animated comedies, demonstrating a diverse interest that complements their affinity for action and adventure narratives.

- **Format Choice:** The user maintains a strong preference for DVDs, valuing physical media for its collectible nature and additional features.

- **Review Style:** The user offers succinct, highly positive feedback, consistently giving top ratings to films they enjoy, reflecting overall satisfaction with their selections.

- **Actor Affinity:** The user appreciates films featuring recognizable talent, including popular voices in animated films, indicating a wide-ranging enthusiasm for well-known actors across various genres.

- **Family-Friendly Content:** The user continues to show a preference for family-friendly viewing options, as evidenced by their latest acquisition, which is rated 'PG', indicating a tolerant approach to mild content.

Overall, the user's preferences highlight a blend of classic nostalgia, a growing appreciation for animated films, an established commitment to physical media, positive feedback tendencies, and a general inclination toward family-friendly, well-cast narratives.
